data.title: Free isn't free
data.text:
I always bought a medium or large size smoothy. When I went to redeem my medium smoothie they charged me $1.50. 

Their buy 9 get 1 free punch card is only good for that month. I had another card from October they wouldn't honor. Kind of a BS frequent buyer program.

data.title: Like this place
data.text: I think what I like about jamba the most is the variety and it clearly states the nutritional and dietary information to assist in what to buy. And all of the flavors I have tried taste great! Usually have great specials and if you are an oatmeal fan it is a must try.
